title: Billi Mucklow stuns fans with with totally naked snap of fiancé Andy Carroll
text:

Billi Mucklow gave her Instagram fans a real insight into what goes on during her holidays with footballer fiancé Andy Carroll.

The couple have jetted off abroad to make their most of their free time together during the international break.

And Newcastle United player Andy, 30, seemed particularly determined to let loose.

As Billi's shocking pic revealed, a body-confident Andy enjoyed strutting round their villa totally naked - and was even happy to bare all in front of their floor to ceiling windows.

(Image: Instagram)

Meanwhile, mum Billi managed to get dressed into a chic crotched mini dress and sandals as she shared a glimpse inside their hotel bedroom.

Andy was in the background bearing his bottom with just a small white towel covering his shoulders after stepping out of the shower.

"Outfit goals," Billi called her beau in her caption - cheekily adding the peach emoji to share her appreciation.

(Image: Instagram)

Her 390k followers went wild for the snap - and even Andy himself seemed surprised when the rude picture went up.

"You've made an arse out of me there!!" he told his wife.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: PA)

Pal Gemma Collins was also loving the naked display as she responded with four laughing emojis.

Earlier in the day, Billi shared snaps of her and Andy enjoying some downtime in their private villa.

So far the pair have been enjoying the mountainous views from their balcony and enjoying the cocktails and endless sunshine on offer.

(Image: Instagram)

Billi, who starred in TOWIE from 2011-2013, became engaged to Andy in 2014.

The footballer popped the question during a romantic trip to Rome in November.

the pair share two children Arlo, born in 2015, and Wolf Nine, born in November 2017.

Andy also has two other children - Emilie Rose and Lucas - from a previous relationship.
description: With the world of Wags divided, Billi Mucklow stepped in to provide some comic relief
